result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Heath C Climer

records.addlTxt:
10:31 AM cases 22CF527, 22CF99, 22CF609 called. Prosecuting Attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Heath C Climer not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Heath C Climer. Attorney Field is unsure why the Defendant is not in court. Court notes multiple missed appearance previously. 
Warrants ordered.

10:03am Cases called: 22CF99, 22CF527 & 22CF609. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Heath C Climer not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Heath C Climer. 

Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 07/11/22 at 1:30pm.
Initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Initial appearance on August 11, 2022 at 09:30 am.

(11:26 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Heath C Climer does not appear in court or via Zoom. Attorney Sonia L Anderson appeared by video for Heath C Climer.
Attorney Anderson advises the defendant contacted the Public Defender's Office and advised is in the hospital and wouldn't be able to attend court today. The defendant is eligible for Public Defender representation. 
State advises the defendant has other pending cases and requests the case be scheduled for the same date and time as the defendant's other cases.
No objection by Attorney Anderson or the Court.
Initial appearance scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
